programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Meets a Police Officer / Paddington and the Balloons) S1 (26/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Meets a Police Officer / Paddington and the Balloons»Jonathan has lost his balloon, Paddington tries to get him a new one but accidentally ends up flying all over London. // After a neighborhood watch talk Paddington decides to go on patrol as an unofficial policeman. Soon he has to solve a real crime.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Fire Engine / Paddington Joins a Club) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Fire Engine / Paddington Joins a Club»Paddington is impressed by a safety talk from the local fire brigade. When there is a real emergency, Paddington to the rescue! // Mateo and Judy form a secret club in the treehouse but won't let Jonathan and Paddington join without a password.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington And Homework) S1 (7/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington And Homework»Paddington tries to help Judy with her geography homework and ends up being the subject of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Une histoire pour George) S4 (17/52)
programme.desc: «Une histoire pour George»Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story. Later George wakes up again, so Peppa has to make up another story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La péniche) S5 (18/52)
programme.desc: «La péniche»After a family trip to a mountain beauty spot, Daddy Pig loses the car keys down a very deep drain.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (La nouvelle niche !) S4 (1/14)
programme.desc: «La nouvelle niche !»Jump into this underwater classroom with Molly, Gil and their fishtailed friends. Preschoolers can learn school-readiness skills like science, math, literacy and more through songs, dances, and laughs!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Une journée de sport avec Blue) S3 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Une journée de sport avec Blue»It's a Backyard Sports Spectacular! Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game. We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Magenta feel ready to play!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La lettre mystère) S3 (n°10)
programme.desc: «La lettre mystère»It's a busy delivery day for Mailbox and there's a special letter that needs to be delivered, but he doesn't know who it is for! We play Blue's Clues to figure out who the letter is for.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Les pierres de pouvoir) S2
programme.desc: «Les pierres de pouvoir»When Santiago and his crew race to protect the magical Stones of Power from being taken by Bonnie Bones, they discover more than they bargained for. Luckily, they receive a little help from their hero -- Capitán Calavera!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Night of the Turtles) S1 (n°6)
programme.desc: «The Night of the Turtles»When Bonnie kidnaps newly-hatched turtles before they can swim to momma out at sea, Santi and crew are on the move.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le casier de Dandy Jones) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Le casier de Dandy Jones»Baby Shark and William must travel to the deep dark depths to retrieve Baby's lost microphone.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Baby Shark, le maire) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Baby Shark, le maire»The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Cranberry Cookies) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Cranberry Cookies»

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Un abri pour la nuit / La Kermesse de la Grande Vallée) S4 (5/26)
programme.desc: «Un abri pour la nuit / La Kermesse de la Grande Vallée»Farmer Al's animals go missing during a sleepover. // Cornelius has escaped from the pig ride at the carnival, and the prizes have gone missing too!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddingtons New Neighbour) S2 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Paddingtons New Neighbour»The Browns have new neighbors & Toq is full of tales like there's a goblin in the garden and her dad is an astronaut! They can't be true, can they?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La tortue de la doctoresse Hamster) S3 (29/52)
programme.desc: «La tortue de la doctoresse Hamster»Doctor Hamster the vet comes to Peppa's playgroup to show the children her pets. But Tiddles has run away. But Ms. Rabbit is going to rescue Tiddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Mer, soleil et neige) S3 (30/52)
programme.desc: «Mer, soleil et neige»Peppa and her friends and family are looking forward to a trip to the beach where they can make sandcastles, but when they arrive at the beach there is too much snow!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'ordinateur de papy Pig) S3 (31/52)
programme.desc: «L'ordinateur de papy Pig»Mummy Pig gives her old PC to Granny and Grandpa Pig. Will they be able to use it?

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Secrets Box) S1 (n°31)
programme.desc: «The Secrets Box»Froga is discussing the notion of secrets with Christopher. She can't keep secrets as they are a burden for her. Anna makes a secrets box where all the friends put their secret inside to feel better!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Bubu's Robot) S1 (n°32)
programme.desc: «Bubu's Robot»Bubu is understandably thrilled when he discovers his old toy robot that he converts into the FIX-IT-UP 5000. Anna, Froga, and Christopher are so impressed with his new fixer-upper robot, Bubu begins to think his friends like his robot more than him!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Tourne un film avec Blue !) S2 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Tourne un film avec Blue !»Josh and Blue are making a movie and they need YOUR help! We play Blue's Clues to figure out the ending of our movie- what will wake Magenta up after a magic flower makes her fall asleep? While looking for clues, we help Rapunzel make her own movie.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (L'ours somnambule / Danny le pro du rodéo) S4 (9/26)
programme.desc: «L'ours somnambule / Danny le pro du rodéo»The pups need to get a sleepwalking bear back home before he wakes up. // Daring Danny X takes his horse off the trail and ends up on a wild ride.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Mission Dino : Le bébé tyrannosaure) S9 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Mission Dino : Le bébé tyrannosaure»When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La chasse aux gros insectes / Le Cerf-ball) S2
programme.desc: «La chasse aux gros insectes / Le Cerf-ball»Lady Fluffpot hates mini-beasts - and Sir Steel creates MEGA-beasts that the Deer squad must deal with. // Things get competitive when Sir Steel takes on the Deer Squad for the Deer Ball Cup - but who's bending the rules?

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La course aux rebonds / Qu'est-ce qui ne va pas, Lola ?) S2 (n°207)
programme.desc: «La course aux rebonds / Qu'est-ce qui ne va pas, Lola ?»It's Deer Squad to the rescue when Stu and Safia bounce off to space on their super bouncy mega trampolines./ A bad mood crystal causes Lola and many animals to become unusually grumpy!Jade has to help Deer Squad to restore joy around Central Forest.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Bone / Paddington Joins a Band) S1 (17/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Bone / Paddington Joins a Band»Mr. Gruber has been loaned a T-Rex Skeleton, but Lucky the dog has stolen the priceless bone and buried it somewhere. // The kids decide to form a rock band with Paddington, but what instrument should he play, and what is rock music?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Quesadillas) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Quesadillas»Quesadillas: Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favourite jar of salsa open, no matter how hard he and his friends try! (S1, ep 7b).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Même pas cap ! / Roy) S1 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Même pas cap ! / Roy»On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Greedyguts / Where is Bali?) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «Greedyguts / Where is Bali?»Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (William, le grand reporter / Au lit, Baby Shark) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «William, le grand reporter / Au lit, Baby Shark»While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter. // Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Best Fin-Ship Day) S1 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Best Fin-Ship Day»Baby Shark tries to give William the best Best Fin-ship Day ever.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Gift Box) S1 (n°78)
programme.desc: «The Gift Box»The friends are having a gift exchange and Bubu ends up with a present from Christopher. When he mistakes the box itself for the actual gift, Christopher is convinced Bubu doesn't like his present.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (An Endless Story) S1 (n°48)
programme.desc: «An Endless Story»Anna is reading Christopher and Froga a story - but when she gets to the end, they discover the last two pages are missing! After a search for the missing pages, they find out that one of them is blank.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Froga's Choice) S1 (n°33)
programme.desc: «Froga's Choice»Froga can't decide which boots to wear for today's group photo with her friends. Anna, Ron, and Bubu try to help her decide, but it makes her decision-making more difficult!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Great Friendship Show) S1 (n°34)
programme.desc: «The Great Friendship Show»Anna and her friends write a poem. Bubu prefers to paint. And the friends do so too. Froga is not so keen on painting, she creates a full-on choreography that Christopher finds hard, he prefers juggling. For Ron, it's poetry.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Mosquito) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «The Mosquito»Froga is petrified of a pesky mosquito, so her friends try everything they can think of to chase it away: they dance, fidget, make loud noises and even try to befriend it. When Bubu activates his homemade stink bomb launcher, it causes such a stink!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Talking Flower) S1 (n°50)
programme.desc: «The Talking Flower»Anna would like to paint a new picture, and Ron his favourite flower: Jaunita. When Anna starts to paint Ron and his flower, Christopher hides behind a bush to trick him and make him believe the flower is a talking back to him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'hôpital) S3 (32/52)
programme.desc: «L'hôpital»Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'hélicoptère de mademoiselle Rabbit) S3 (34/52)
programme.desc: «L'hélicoptère de mademoiselle Rabbit»Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and her family for a ride in her rescue helicopter.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La leçon de danse) S1 (31/52)
programme.desc: «La leçon de danse»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'orage) S1 (32/52)
programme.desc: «L'orage»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La reine) S4 (27/52)
programme.desc: «La reine»The Queen decided to give out an award for the hardest working person. She announces that the medal will go to Miss Rabbit. She is invited to the Queen's palace for a special ceremony. She takes her friends with her, including Peppa and George. After the ceremony is done they all go to the garden and Peppa shows the Queen just how fun muddy puddles are.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'herbe est toujours plus verte ailleurs / Quand je serai grand) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «L'herbe est toujours plus verte ailleurs / Quand je serai grand»Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Pour maman / Barbacarambolage) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Pour maman / Barbacarambolage»The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La course autour du monde) S5 (17/20)
programme.desc: «La course autour du monde»In their biggest race ever, Blaze and AJ go head-to-head against Crusher to race all the way around the Earth and win the World's Biggest Trophy!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Les Jeux de la médaille d'or) S5 (20/20)
programme.desc: «Les Jeux de la médaille d'or»It's time for the Gold Medal Games, and Blaze is ready to compete! But when Crusher cheats and sends his rival flying far away, Blaze has to speed back to Axle City to beat the buzzer and win that medal!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La bonne vieille source / Le poney) S3 (13/26)
programme.desc: «La bonne vieille source / Le poney»Ryder and the pups need to unplug Old Trusty the geyser to stop water sprouting up all over town.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le bébé Pingouin / Le spectacle des chats) S4 (2/26)
programme.desc: «Le bébé Pingouin / Le spectacle des chats»Everest and Jake try to rescue a little penguin and end up floating out to sea on a homemade bridge.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La puissance du cristal / Un Métal en toc) S2 (n°208)
programme.desc: «La puissance du cristal / Un Métal en toc»Dinky the baby turtle is given a special courage crystal by Jade but Sir Steel thinks will boost his Mech Suit's powers. // What's worse than Sir Steel? Two Sir Steels! Can the Deer Squad spot the real one with Muffin's help?

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Turnip For the Books) S1 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Turnip For the Books»Sir Steel almost crushes Platinum city with a giant turnip during a Vegetable Show.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Meets a Police Officer / Paddington and the Balloons) S1 (26/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Meets a Police Officer / Paddington and the Balloons»Jonathan has lost his balloon, Paddington tries to get him a new one but accidentally ends up flying all over London. // After a neighborhood watch talk Paddington decides to go on patrol as an unofficial policeman. Soon he has to solve a real crime.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Fire Engine / Paddington Joins a Club) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Fire Engine / Paddington Joins a Club»Paddington is impressed by a safety talk from the local fire brigade. When there is a real emergency, Paddington to the rescue! // Mateo and Judy form a secret club in the treehouse but won't let Jonathan and Paddington join without a password.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Capitaine Papa Dog) S4 (15/52)
programme.desc: «Capitaine Papa Dog»Mummy Dog and Danny are very excited! Captain Daddy Dog is home from the sea, and he's bearing gifts! What can they be?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le parc aux dinosaures de Papy Rabbit) S4 (16/52)
programme.desc: «Le parc aux dinosaures de Papy Rabbit»Peppa and her friends are celebrating Freddy Fox's birthday at Grampy Rabbit's dinosaur themed park. Grampy takes them on a wild adventure and shows them some singing dinosaurs. The gang then follows dinosaur footprints to find a special surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Une histoire pour George) S4 (17/52)
programme.desc: «Une histoire pour George»Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story. Later George wakes up again, so Peppa has to make up another story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La péniche) S5 (18/52)
programme.desc: «La péniche»After a family trip to a mountain beauty spot, Daddy Pig loses the car keys down a very deep drain.

programme.desc: «La nouvelle niche !»Jump into this underwater classroom with Molly, Gil and their fishtailed friends. Preschoolers can learn school-readiness skills like science, math, literacy and more through songs, dances, and laughs!

programme.desc: «La lettre mystère»It's a busy delivery day for Mailbox and there's a special letter that needs to be delivered, but he doesn't know who it is for! We play Blue's Clues to figure out who the letter is for.

programme.desc: «The Night of the Turtles»When Bonnie kidnaps newly-hatched turtles before they can swim to momma out at sea, Santi and crew are on the move.

programme.desc: «Le casier de Dandy Jones»Baby Shark and William must travel to the deep dark depths to retrieve Baby's lost microphone.

programme.desc: «Baby Shark, le maire»The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day.

programme.desc: «Cranberry Cookies»

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Un abri pour la nuit / La Kermesse de la Grande Vallée) S4 (5/26)
programme.desc: «Un abri pour la nuit / La Kermesse de la Grande Vallée»Farmer Al's animals go missing during a sleepover. // Cornelius has escaped from the pig ride at the carnival, and the prizes have gone missing too!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddingtons New Neighbour) S2 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Paddingtons New Neighbour»The Browns have new neighbors & Toq is full of tales like there's a goblin in the garden and her dad is an astronaut! They can't be true, can they?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa Pig, champion du monde) S3 (43/52)
programme.desc: «Papa Pig, champion du monde»Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le moulin à paroles) S3 (44/52)
programme.desc: «Le moulin à paroles»Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camion de Monsieur Fox) S3 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Le camion de Monsieur Fox»When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van - even a chicken!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Remember-ator) S1 (n°35)
programme.desc: «The Remember-ator»Froga can't seem to remember anything today! Even her piano lesson with Christopher! S+he decides to put sticky notes all around the house as reminders. But it is not very convenient! Bubu offers to be her reminder, friends the best reminders of all!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Treasure Hunt) S1 (n°36)
programme.desc: «The Treasure Hunt»Froga organizes a treasure hunt for her friends! Everyone is enthusiastic, except Ron is not with them. Froga realises the treasure has now disappeared. When the treasure hunters have finally found Ron, they also found him..with the missing treasure!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Making Bread / From One Pit to Another) S1 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Making Bread / From One Pit to Another»Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned...

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue au pays des dinosaures) S3 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Blue au pays des dinosaures»It's a prehistoric game of Blue's Clues when a mysterious dinosaur egg falls out of the skidoo frame and starts to hatch! We figure out what kind of dinosaur is inside the egg so we can reunite the egg with their family.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le pique-nique de l'extrême / La Fête des tartes) S5 (5/26)
programme.desc: «Le pique-nique de l'extrême / La Fête des tartes»Daring Danny X is performing a new stunt! He is harnessed over a canyon eating an Extreme Lunch when the wind blows him upside down! // It's Pie Swap Day! Humdinger sends Rocky Kitty to take one of Mr. Porter's tasty pies, so he can join the contest.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La roue de Métal / Le bongo de Bobbi) S2 (16/20)
programme.desc: «La roue de Métal / Le bongo de Bobbi»When Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern, they end up in danger when Sir Steel goes treasure hunting!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Lady Monkey Mech / Critter Care Calamity) S2 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Lady Monkey Mech / Critter Care Calamity»Sir Steel wrecks havoc during Harvest Parade so Lady Fluffpot can shop in peace. Can Deer Squad save the parade? // Pollen from Bobbi's snuffleblooms makes everyone start getting super sneezes. Lola activates her Critter Care Centre to help everyone!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the House Guest / Paddington and the Banana) S1 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the House Guest / Paddington and the Banana»Mr. Curry is invited by Paddington to stay with the Browns whilst his flooded house is being repaired. He thinks the Browns are too disorganized so starts to change the way things are done in the Brown's house. When will he leave? // Paddington accidentally takes a banana from the café without paying for it. He must return it before Sophia notices and calls PC Wells but Mrs. Bird turns it into a cake! What will he do?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Guacamole) S1 (n°6)
programme.desc: «Guacamole»

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres»The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. // The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens»Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le camping en famille / La parade de bienvenue) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «Le camping en famille / La parade de bienvenue»It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Rocky-Bye) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Rocky-Bye»Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Circus Celebration) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Circus Celebration»Bubu's DVD of his favorite circus show does not work. The others create their own circus acts in the backyard. Doing acrobatics, juggling, and magic! Bubu joins them, even when the DVD player is fixed, they prefer to stay in the backyard to play!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Friendship Journal) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Friendship Journal»Anna decides to make a scrapbook to celebrate Friendship, where each try to come up with something special enough to deserve the first page in her "friendship journal.".

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Hide and Seek) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Hide and Seek»Anna and her friends are outside playing Ron's favorite game, Hide-and-Seek! Anna is the Seeker and quickly finds Froga, Christopher and Bubu. When the friends work together to try to find Ron, they realize he's found the best hiding spot of all.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save the Reef / Aqua Pups Stop a Giant Squid) S9 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save the Reef / Aqua Pups Stop a Giant Squid»The Aqua Pups rescue Coral, Moby, and McSquidly from a submarine before it crashes into a delicate reef. // The Aqua Pups must save the Merpups' golden orb release when Moby lures a Giant Squid into Puplantis.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Merdinger / Aqua Pups Save the Whale Patrolle) S9 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Merdinger / Aqua Pups Save the Whale Patrolle»When Humdinger disguises himself as a "Merdinger" to steal the purple pearl, the PAW Patrol must return it to Puplantis. // After Moby swipes the Whale Patroller and all the Pups' vehicles, the pups climb aboard sea creatures to chase it down.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race) S9 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race»Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race: The Paw Patrol take part in a big mer-race, but must come to the rescue when Moby's cheating puts Puplantis in serious danger. (S9, ep 18).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle) S9 (14/25)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle»When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral (Skye's long-lost merpup cousin) to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Big Rig to the Rescue!) S6 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Big Rig to the Rescue!»When three big deliveries are needed all over Axle City, there's only one monster machine with the power to haul it all: Big Rig Blaze! But even Big Rig Blaze may not be able to make all the deliveries in time.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Aventure extraterrestre) S5 (15/20)
programme.desc: «Aventure extraterrestre»Blaze and AJ make friends with a space alien named Gormy! But when Gormy's jetpack loses power, they set out to help him find six special space batteries so he can fly home to his alien family!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le Défilé de ballons géants / La Tarentule des cavernes) S6 (16/26)
programme.desc: «Le Défilé de ballons géants / La Tarentule des cavernes»The Turbot cousins try to spot a rare spider, but get stuck in its web. It's up to the PAW Patrol save the spider spies!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Une chaleur écrasante / Alex l'apprenti fermier) S4 (15/26)
programme.desc: «Une chaleur écrasante / Alex l'apprenti fermier»It's hot in Adventure Bay and everyone wants ice cream. Unfortunately, everything is finished and the delivery is late. Captain Turbot and Francois compete against each other in a bag-jumping competition.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (The Supersized Sunflower) S2 (n°10)
programme.desc: «The Supersized Sunflower»The Supersized Sunflower: Ricardo hosts a sunflower competition, but Lola is worried hers is ill - surely a little Wood Power will perk it up? (S2, ep 10a).
